data.event: The city of Dayton, platted in 1855, is named for city founder, Lyman Dayton (1810â€“1865).

event.title: development of the Lake Superior and Mississippi Railroad, of which he was President until 1865

data.event: Through his energy and finances, Lyman Dayton was instrumental in bringing the railroad into Minnesota and development of the Lake Superior and Mississippi Railroad, of which he was President until 1865.

event.title: January 15, 2003 the city's most recent geographical expanse extended

data.event: On January 15, 2003 the city's most recent geographical expanse extended its boundaries.
